website_summaries.verdict: As a casual trainer, the Skechers Burst – Second Wind is a great shoe for walks and workouts as its mesh upper and cushioning system keeps the feet cool and breathable. This sneaker feels good on foot because of its reliable cushioning system that adequately keeps the foot comfortable all throughout the day. Its lightweight and flexible sole is also among the factors to consider when buying this affordable shoe that is a perfect daily companion for some gym time or for other activities that need serious walking.
pros: A good number of reviewers find the shoe’s cushioning memory foam extremely soft and comfortable
Several users appreciate that the memory foam insole is removable as those with ankle and pronation problems are able to adjust the insole
Open knit mesh material for the upper keeps feet well ventilated and cool, says most users
Various critics remark that the shoe materials are very light that they feel comfortable even for an extended period of walking
Some wearers are impressed by the good arch support, cushioning, and stability provided by the Burst midsole
A few users find this as a good recovery shoe after a heavy workout and high-impact activities
The Skechers Burst – Second Wind have a good bounce and support for high-impact jumps or walks, according to reviewers
Cushioned collar, textile lining, and plush tongue provide comfortable in-shoe feel, say some users
A lot of users find these shoes great for indoor and outdoor activities as the Burst grip traction outsole allows a lot of flexibility and movement
cons: Some users have claimed that the upper mesh material gets ripped after heavy use
A few reviewers have commented that the thin soles wear easily

customer_reviews.title: It's a well spent money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift. These sport sneakers are fabulous! Incredibly comfortable and flexible.It is recommended for prolonged standing on hard surfaces turf and gym floors on daily basis, moderate exercise programs and of course for walkaround comfort...these are amazing. Skechers have many good looking models and air cooled memory foam. it's so comfortable, light and breathable.It's a well spent money.

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Burst-Second Wind Low-Top Sneakers
product_meta.description: Get revitalized with athletic technology and cool sporty style in the Skechers BURST - SECOND WIND shoe. Skech knit mesh fabric upper in a lace up athletic comfort sneaker with interwoven, nearly seamless design. Air cooled memory foam insole, burst midsole.
